content:
/>
VII.i.3.B.1.b
.
Recognizing the Biological Child of a Female Veteran
Evidence adequate to establish a child’s age, as outlined in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 3.A.4
, is also adequate to establish the biological child of a
female
Veteran as the Veteran’s child for VA purposes.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Biological Children, Adopted Children, and Stepchildren
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B
